product_name: Custom Correct Seven Lakes Basin Map
long_description: Covers the Seven Lakes Basin area ranging from Slide Peak to Hurricane Hill. Scale is 1:62,500; scale matches USGS (United States Geological Survey) 15 Minute Series. Elevations in feet; road and trail distances in miles and kilometers. One inch is equivalent to a mile; contour interval is 100 feet. National Geodetic Vertical Datum of 1929; Compiled from 1985 USGS base maps.
short_description: Covers the Seven Lakes Basin area ranging from Slide Peak to Hurricane Hill.
